Name: The Adventure of NAYU
About the game: This is the cozy adventure of Nayu the fox! What can you expect to encounter on this adventure? The adventure is as simple as a click. It is a laid back journey without any challenging action or puzzle elements. So, if you're tired of our gritty world, this is for you! ◆ Adventuring 101 ◆ hit! (click) hit!! (click) hit!!! (click) *The weapons we use are made of soft materials. No enemies were harmed during the making of this adventure! You can use the star shards you obtain along the way to train your party and unlock cute costumes! The game works as an idle game. Nayu will continue to battle even when you are busy! ◆ STORY ◆ Join Nayu the fox on her adventure! Meet friends, face foes and discover what the world of Nayu has to offer. This adventure is short, sweet and especially cute! Playing time: 20-30 minutes ◆ ENDLESS ◆ Keep on battling your way through the world of Nayu, forever! This is the perfect mode to get your hands on star shards or to increase your level. You will be able to play Endless Mode after completing Story Mode. Playing time: As long as you like! ◆ BONUS ◆ - Path to the Cheese - A mini-game where you collect the Cheese. You will be able to play Path to the Cheese after completing Story Mode.
